typographies.tuto_step_1: 1. Check the map to find the hidden boxes.
typographies.tuto_step_2: 2. Spot a QR code and scan it.
typographies.tuto_step_4: 4. Redeem your prize and receive it at home or via email for virtual vouchers.

alerts.game_validity: Valid while supplies last and until June 30, 2024.
